title: Island Roulette
description: When recent graduate Samantha Lee ends up trapped in a place she’s always dreamed of, it’s up to one man to win her heart in paradise. As time progresses, five others will try to remind her why he should no longer have it. In the best way possible, of course. With her uncanny sense of wit, and a charm all her own, she embarks on an adventure of a lifetime filled with laughter, romance, suspense, and a touch of erotic flair. Like a roulette wheel out of control she constantly spins, not knowing where she’s going to stop until it’s much too late. This book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Emily   Smith
